"Okie" answered the snake avoiding the shot and spat his acyd toward 
the missile laucher. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Repressor::
> 
> Repressor nods. "Of course. But if you use a venom weapon or 
something 
> of that type, don't inject too much. Fist bot that goes unconscious 
> wins, the winner has to take him to a CR. Anything goes."
> 
> With that, Repressor brings up a missile launcher, firing at Najah.
>
